item.title: [SCRUM-80] 4.1. Inadequate Home Navigation Indicator on Mobile
item.description: Only an arrow is present without any text label which might not be clear to users.
pre-conditions: 2. Browser Chrome is installed on desktop;
steps to reproduce: 1. Login with a valid email and password;
expected results: 1. Main page is loaded. Reports button is visible;
2. Reports page is loaded. Main Page button is visible;
item.actual results: Main Page button is not visible.
item.attachment name: bug - back to main page on mobile.png
